root.str: Lashing Ammunition converts 40% of the weapon's direct damage into a small explosive blast on impact, but in-flight velocity is reduced by 50%.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Liberator Inertial Dampener - Level 3
Apply the Indar Dunes camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Allows cortium to be used to create a garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer. VS use only.
Our forces have been getting decimated by the enemy's air power. Pick your ground based weapon of choice, get out there, and knock them out of the sky!
The T20 Fist utilizes the devastating 11x105 cartridge, the most powerful round used by the TR. Its unrivaled stopping power is kept in check by the time between shots.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Apply the Clover camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
VS: MAX: Flame 01: Right Auraxium Medal
The M20 Basilisk is a slow-firing 20mm HMG that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Harasser's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
There is no room for the player to mount the object at this location
Customize your Magrider with armor plating. VS use only.

Any player with a recurring membership will receive 500 Daybreak Cash per month as long as they stay on an auto-renew payment plan. If you have a recurring membership but you cancel or purchase a non-recurring membership, you will no longer be on an auto-renew payment plan and you will immediately stop receiving the monthly Daybreak Cash bonus even if you have time left on your existing membership.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Apply the Comic Book camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. VS use only.

Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle which prevents you and nearby allied vehicles from automatically showing on minimap radar, and prevents lock-on attempts for 8 seconds. Can be used once every 40 seconds.
Increases Sticky Grenade capacity to two
This customization adds a Yellow decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Adds a touch of 'Bling' to your Magrider. VS use only.
You have been ejected from the vehicle because the owner has set the vehicle to squad only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
TR: Vehicle - Customization - PS2 Badge Promo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 216 rounds.

Hello! We here at Nanite Systems have been monitoring your progress, and have established that you qualify for a limited-time offer to join our combat personnel staff. All Nanite Systems Operatives (NSO) employees receive fair compensation, health benefits, and the best retirement plan on the market. If you have an interest in learning more about this exciting new job opportunity, please speak to your local Nanite Systems recruitment specialist onboard Sanctuary.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.27 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Plateau camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font size="18">Each time a bountied target dies, you and the killer will be rewarded bonus experience! Bounties last for three lives and show a high value target indicator above the enemy's head when spotted.</font>
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your Weapon. TR use only.
Listen up, soldier - The Suits have opened up new opportunities for entrepreneurial forces to compete in.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 920 rounds.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Roughneck Voice Pack. VS Male use only.

The Nascent Expedition coordinator, Tolland, is looking for a rare 21st century novel recorded on real paper. Warden Hadley of the New Conglomerate is an avid collector of these tales and may be able to help.
The Phalanx Turret can be manned to defend the base
Allows the user to carry 2 IFF devices at a time
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
The Ursa features manageable recoil and a high velocity projectile, making it extremely effective at ranges beyond that of other LMGs. VS use only.
Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 10%, and your hold-breath time recharges 50% faster.
Deploy Storm Buoys in the designated area
The AF-19 Mercenary became the standard issue carbine for the NC due to its low production costs. It features controllable recoil that makes it effective at close to medium ranges. NC use only.
Reduces the lock on time of the missile launcher by 7%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
This bundle contains one random common or uncommon implant.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. All factions can use NS weapons.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> What piqued the researchers' interest in these? There is no evidence of scientific apparatus or excavation equipment. And it is not as if they can be drained of energy. Onward to the next shrine.
Error retrieving credit card types, please try again later!
When activated, Lockdown anchors the MAX to the ground allowing for greater rate of fire, reload speed and projectile speed.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rockets.
New year? New you! Celebrate the new year with this kazoo-filled party bundle!
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Pistol Hood Ornament. TR use only.260200902 ucdn
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Deploy construction objects near Staging Sites
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 31 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 shells.
Applies a special Wrel decal to your vehicle.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Boosts movement servo power, allowing the MAX to sprint through enemy fire.
The Aegis Shield absorbs incoming damage from the front; while the shield is active the MAX cannot fire and is still vulnerable to damage from the rear and sides.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.375 seconds.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Apply the Comic Book camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
This platinum variant of the NSX Tanto is a powerful, lightweight carbine which combines precision with versatility, and is most effective in short bursts. All factions can use NS weapons.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 100 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
Normal fall damage now starts at 50 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 150 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Springing up seemingly overnight, some of the new flora scattered around the Shattered Warpgate are emitting a strange energy signature. If this plantlife can lead to new technological advances for better or ill, gathering samples becomes a high priority. In a welcome change of pace, teams of soldiers set out on gardening duty, using their knives to delicately harvest the glowing cores within these young plant specimens.
Customize your Magrider with Chrome Spliced Plating. VS use only.
艾美瑞什 Forest v2 Armor Camo
Earned by being the Prowler driver when a passenger kills an enemy.
Standard Vanu Sovereignty Light Assault Helmet
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Vanguard. NC use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Mosquito to 21 minutes.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "7" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Vanguard to 27 minutes.
Reduces damage taken by indirect AOE hits for 2 hours. Rank 16 required.
You need more resources. Wait a bit.
//// VS Field Commander Welcome, 艾美瑞什.
The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Spend an A.S.P. token to unlock this new skill?
Check your fire! Uncontrolled damage to ally forces will not be tolerated.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. VS use only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Nalla's going to be handling the big picture stuff for the operation, so you're going to be stuck with me in your ear for the day-to-day details. Glad to have you aboard, kid. I'll contact you when we're ready to start.
Howl at the moon with your entire pack with this horn. All factions may use this item.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> Contact us the next time you're available for a mission on Esamir. We've fixed the problem and need good soldiers to clean the place out and make sure everything is working as it should.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Dyno-Mite Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Adds the Gold Shatterguard Windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Urban Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Adds green chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler.
Adds the Chrome Shovel Head Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
艾美瑞什 Forest v2 - Single Use

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> Nascent Expeditions has called for assistance- meaning every cultist, robot, and terrorist this side of the wormhole will be there. We need soldiers looking after our interests. And that means you! Report to Nalla immediately.
Old-war standard issue Vanu Sovereignty armor. Outdated design, but still keeps up on the battlefield. VS use only.
Utilizing an energy efficient power core interface, the experimental Phobos VX86 is able to provide sustained fire before needing a new battery. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shots.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

Generates a shield for the Sunderer when deployed that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. Damage done to the Sunderer or the shield will delay the shields regeneration for 10 seconds.
Customize the colors of the empire-related elements displayed on the HUD.
You are not allowed inside the New Conglomerate embassy.
Lightweight forest camo plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Hey slick, glad you're interested in the gig, but we can't really talk here, too many ears. So, head to Esamir and I'll contact you once you've arrived.
Increases the Afterburner Fuel capacity by 50%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 shots.
MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.
The Terran Republic has taken Peris!
Air Render Distance Setting. This specifies the maximum distance that an object will be rendered while in an air vehicle. Can be set between 300m and 6000m (Default 4000m)

Acolyte, our investigation has begun. With the Warpgate on Esamir destroyed, an ancient energy has seeped into the soil and cultivated new plant life. The energy within these plants could be harvested to our benefit.

Main Battle Tank
It has a seat for a pilot and a gunner. The pilot controls the vehicle as well as the main weapon. The gunner controls a smaller top mounted gun. The secondary gun can be customized to provide good defense against specific targets.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Search the ruins for a working computer console. Please ensure there are as few interruptions as possible during the data transmission.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Unlock the PMG-3XB with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 50 seconds.
This customization adds a Pink decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 525 rounds.
Now eliminate New Conglomerate and Vanu Sovereignty targets.
Apply the Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
With a high-capacity battery, this photon machinegun has proven to be an effective insurance policy during trade-route negotiations off-world. All factions can use NS weapons.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Your squad invitation from [*source*] has expired.
ANTs and Sunderers are free during this event
Can only be activated if the driver is an Infiltrator. Activate to cloak the Flash. Cloaking the Flash makes it and the riders nearly invisible, but disables firing. Lasts up to 40 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Intimidating, isn't it? This storm represents the impending catastrophe that could befall all of Esamir, even Auraxis, if left unchecked.
Our scientists were hard at work saving Esamir... and building this bundle. There are items for all factions in this bundle.
Icarus Jump Jets provide significantly faster vertical thrust and fuel recharge rate at the cost of in-air maneuverability and overall fuel capacity.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 7 minutes.
This customization adds a Daisy decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> A Veridian Genetics keycard? But it looks much newer than the building that we were in earlier. You should return to the underground base and see what it unlocks.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 3 rounds, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
Apply the Phoenix camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your armor, weapon and vehicle. VS use only.
Grief points will decay over time so accidents will be forgiven automatically.

A 6x zoom scope useful when engaging targets at greater distances.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Grassland camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
ANT Mineral Radar is now passive and rank 1 is auto granted. Certifications spent for the Utility version have been refunded (Ranks will need to be repurchased for the passive line).
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 3.
Reduces the cooldown period for Rebirth.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Unlocks the ability for the Galaxy pilot to force drop all of its passengers out of the aircraft.
Apply the single use Arid Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the single use Indar Plateau camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Hovering over a certification segment will give you more details about that particular upgrade.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> We are preparing a mining drill to drop from orbit. We will contact you when it is deployed. Carry on as normal until then.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Lightning. TR use only.
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. TR use only.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Fogbreach Headlights for your Sunderer. NC only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Esamir sure has been through a lot. Switch your Engineer loadout and take a look at the nearest friendly Containment Site.
Increases the top speed of the Galaxy by 8 KPH.
A Galaxy of Service Mission Start String. This should show up when the player accepts the mission. Replace with meaningful text after its up and running.
Reduces cooldown of Spitfire Auto-Turret by 5 seconds.
This customization adds the Leaderstar decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers and also places a fortification shield around the Galaxy.
Increases the number of restoration kits that can be carried to 4.
This first-generation particle-projector cannon charges up to fire a burst of short range highly concentrated particles to damage armored targets. NSO use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. Available for all factions.
Contains Zealot armor for all non-MAX infantry classes. VS use only.
Resupply allied vehicles on the front line.

You automatically spot targets who damage you, and while not inside a vehicle, you are also notified on the HUD when spotted by an enemy. Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.

Perfect implants cannot be broken down.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Use a warpgate terminal to travel to 艾美瑞什, Esamir, Hossin, or Indar
Decoy grenades have been removed from the game, the cert points spent on them have been refunded.
Killing an enemy partially recharges the Adrenaline Shield's capacitor.
Improved brakes, turn, and roll. (More effective than previous rank)
[*target*] failed to leave the platoon due to bad platoon info.
Apply the single use Indar Savanna camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Objective complete, operative. You and your PML can rest for now, but I may check in later with some additional mining targets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Were you ever stationed on Oshur, prior to the war? Sometimes it's difficult to remember what life was like before all this. Almost daily scientific advancements in agriculture, medicine, or industry.

Kills and revives restore 30% of your Nano-Regen Device energy, and reviving an ally increases your resistance to small arms damage by 25% for 3.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
You can see more around you by increasing your Field of View in the graphics settings.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.

The Magrider is the Vanu Sovereignty's main battle tank. It features the greatest agility of any battle tank it is the only tank that can strafe.Drive this Magrider to the waypoint marked on your HUD.
Launches several decoy flares. Disrupting lock-ons and any missiles currently tracking the vehicle.
Collect dog tags near your faction's carrier on Oshur
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Unlock performance upgrades that improve the hovering of the vehicle.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 21 minutes.
Unlocks seat 11 to be used in the vehicle.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> If we're lucky, however, these older, now abandoned Amp Stations, may still have tools we can use to gather information. Please head to Esamir and visit what remains of the Nott or Elli Amp Stations.

Activate to passively reload your weapons for 11.25 seconds. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Deploy the ANT to access the construction terminal.
Try shooting some targets while aiming down sights.

Black Box

Altitude 600 meters. Destination, Saerro Listening Post.
"I'm having a hard time hearing you, command. Some static in the comms."
Altitude 600 meters. Destination, Saerro Listening Post.
"Please repeat your last. Are we diverting or not?"
Altitude 600 meters. Destination, Saerro Listening Post.
"Command? I repeat are we... Wait, what is that..."
Altitude 500 meters. Destination, unknown.
Altitude 300 meters. Destination, unknown.
Altitude 20 meters. Destination, unknown.
When powered by a nearby silo, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity.
The IPC Targeting Dart fires a dart projectile that can be targeted by Glaive IPC, the projectiles of each tool is linked to and can only be targeted by the cannon it is pulled from.

Unlocks the Neutralizer Device for the Tactical Slot. This device depletes the charge on abandoned post-collapse vehicles.

Hold Fire to deplete energy.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Use to call out enemy players and mark them on your heads-up-display.
While in a vehicle, spot targets and scan for anti-tank mines. If you can't engage these targets, your allies may be able to!

Of course you know, this means war! Available to VS, NC, and TR factions.
+20% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the April Fools event.

The colossal Space Needles loom over Oshur's horizon like monolithic gravestones. Although unable to communicate, the gravely injured researcher from the now-flooded subterranean facility has revealed schematics of significant interest to the empires of Auraxis. Will this technology be used as a safeguard? Or will it birth a new weapon of war?
Doubles the number of total bolts stored, but the weapon now takes 20% longer to equip and unequip.
Capture and hold all 3 Amp Stations on Hossin
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Enemy explosives within 10 meters are automatically spotted.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> We've received your data upload. Many of these sectors are corrupted, but there is enough here to begin our investigation.
Contains schematics for the Elysium Spawn Tube, Vehicle Ammo Dispenser, Light Air Terminal, Alarm Module, and Light Vehicle Terminal. Unlocks for all factions.
Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 90 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Listen up, solider. The Republic is spending a tremendous amount of money to get back to Oshur. That island paradise once belonged to us and it will again if we have anything to say about it!
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.

The L-24R Spur is equipped with specialized optics that allow the pilot to adjust the weapons aim rather than being fixed forward.

Optics for this weapon are engaged with Weapon Optic function or Cockpit Mouse Freelook hotkeys.
Applies a special Wrel decal to your armor.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
The Sunderer you last spawned at is under attack!
The heavier Typhoon class rocklet carries a more powerful anti-armor payload, but sacrifices its flak-like anti-air capabilities.
Weapon can be fired faster after sprinting. Lasts 24 hours. Rank 48 required.
This armor can only be worn by TR Engineers.
Increases the duration of the Gate Shield Diffuser to 10 seconds.

The Focused Proton FBW is a highly effective anti-tank guided plasma cannon. Once a lock-on is established seeking plasma can be fired and will seek the locked target. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.
When your shield is broken, you gain 20% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
The galaxy terminal allows the defending team to purchase galaxy dropships.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Hello, operative. I'm told your previous mission has concluded. We will now be executing resource recovery operations on Esamir.
Reduces cooldowns and increases speed after kills
Apply the Digital camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Allows 1 additional grenade of any type to be carried.
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.

With this update we introduce the new Campaign and Mission systems, and make updates to Sanctuary and Outfit Resources!

  • Campaigns are a multi-month evolution of the in-game world with story-driven events taking place with each chapter.

  • You can now visit the Missions screen to receive a new pool of missions updated daily. Complete missions to earn rewards!

  • Returning to Sanctuary will unveil some updated visuals and polish, as well as kick off your Campaigns adventure.

  • Outfit Resource gathering and War Asset costs have been revisited. You now earn the resources shown on the map by assisting in base captures, and expeditions now provide higher, more consistent payouts.
Apply the Purple Giraffe camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. NC use only.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership due to bad player ID.
Reduces damage taken from small arms, and heavy machine guns, gatling guns, aircraft machineguns, anti-aircraft machineguns, and anti-materiel rifles by 20%.
The LA64 Vanquisher AR is effective at ranges past typical assault rifles due to its easily controllable burst fire mode.
They're pushing us around out there!
Kill enemy MAX units as a MAX.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
When engaged (hold shift), the afterburner will quickly accelerate the Mosquito to 350 KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.
The Sunderer or ANT must be acquired from a Warpgate Ground Vehicle Terminal for it to be part of the convoy.
Scout rifle - Iron Sight Front Description
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
If NS is going to borrow your head with their nifty new tech, we might as well take advantage of it. Head to Esamir and gather readings on the new ecology.
Regions represent ownership of a portion of the continent and are shaded by the owning empire's color. These colors can be changed in the game settings.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1.5 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 14 meters.
The TR SI-12 Machine Gun is the standard issue anti personnel weapon for Terran Republic vehicles.
Deal significant damage to enemy aircraft while in a Lightning.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Tiger Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Certs spent on ESF Afterburner Fuel Tank have been refunded, the highest tier of the item is now default.

We have discovered a new off-world warpgate. Research at this location is of a sensitive matter and must be reclaimed. The immense amount of power required to stabilize the connection, even for a short time, can only be drawn from a Containment Site. Operatives have been enlisted to discreetly reroute power in the facility while our technicians calibrate their systems.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Replaces the default bolt with a heavier, explosive tipped variant that does moderate damage to MAX units and armored targets, reduces the number of shots in the magazine by one.
The Flail Targeting Dart fires a dart projectile that can be targeted by the Flail. The projecitles of each tool is linked to and can only be targeted by the Flail it is pulled from.
The M20 Mustang is the standard air superiority nose cannon for the NC Reaver. Its high caliber rounds allow it to do more damage up close and at range. NC use only.
Repairs 1.5% every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shells.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 rounds.
Further increases the range of the EMP Spiker

Our Ops/Intel crew is requesting targets be marked for elimination and enemy bases be prepped for capture. Command is deploying field assets to the region, so grab your cloak and report to the front lines as an Infiltrator.



Must be an Infiltrator to complete objectives.
There are currently no encode jobs for video capture.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

The foremost mining and logistics organization known as Nascent Expeditions enters into an agreement with Nanite Systems. Operatives across Auraxis are supplied with hand-held mining lasers, and gear up for the work ahead.
艾美瑞什: Cap and Hold
Changes the quality of shadows. Low uses blob shadows, medium draws real shadows at a short distance, and high will draw real shadows at a great distance. Higher qualities may decrease performance.
Adds cosmetic tires to the Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.

Standing still for 0.5 seconds provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 630 seconds.
Adds custom hubcaps to your Harasser. NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Now, let's defend this outpost. Leave the Spawn Room.
Further improves the vehicle's traction, turning, brakes and reverse speed.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.317944839 ucdn
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "D" Gold Hood Ornament.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> The crystals pushed out by the Elysium Drills have are valuable, soldier. Locate a drill planetside and either use the NE-11 PML to destroy the crystals or kill nearby enemies who may seek to do the same.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.

Customize your soldier's voice with this Greenhorn Voice Pack. TR Female use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Mosquito by 15%.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Adds an image projection to your flashlight. Decals are weapon-specific. TR use only.
The Ghost VS12's high rate of fire provides considerable lethality at medium range due to its modified heat-shunting discharge coil. VS use only.
The arm-mounted NCM1 Scattercannon functions as an automatic shotgun capable of cutting through enemy squads. NC use only.
Unlock performance upgrades that increase the turn rate of the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Increases the rotation speed of the Vanguard by 12 degrees/second.
Failed to remove the squad from the platoon.
